title: Casa Del Void – A Star Guardian Holiday

replies.body: "He got reworked, we don't talk anymore" LMAOOO I died.

I really like this its funny and light, unlike the serious nature of the game. Made me laugh with the ezreal/urgot part and the void salts part with kha'zix. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAH, very good i love it <3{{sticker:sg-lux}}
